verses.text: Moreover thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \add with\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*: \add with\add* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* of \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them.\f + \fr 26.1 \ft of cunning…: Heb. the work of a cunning workman, or, embroiderer\f*

The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \add shall be\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and every one of the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* shall have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*.

The \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* shall be coupled \w together|strong="H2266"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* to \w another|strong="H0269"\w*; and \add other\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add shall be\add* \w coupled|strong="H2266"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* to \w another|strong="H0269"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* upon the \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* from the \w selvedge|strong="H7098"\w* in the \w coupling|strong="H2279"\w*; and likewise shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w uttermost|strong="H7020"\w* \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of \add another\add* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w*, in the \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*.\f + \fr 26.4 \ft selvedge: an edge of cloth so woven that it cannot unravel\f*

\w Fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w*, and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*; that the \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* may take \w hold|strong="H6901"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* of \w another|strong="H0269"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w taches|strong="H7165"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w couple|strong="H2266"\w* the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* together \w with|strong="H0802"\w* the \w taches|strong="H7165"\w*: and it shall be \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add of\add* \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add* to be a \w covering|strong="H0168"\w* upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*: \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w*.

The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \add shall be\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and the \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add shall be all\add* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*.

And thou shalt \w couple|strong="H2266"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* by themselves, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* by themselves, and shalt \w double|strong="H3717"\w* the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* in the \w forefront|strong="H4136"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* on the \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \add that is\add* \w outmost|strong="H7020"\w* in the \w coupling|strong="H2279"\w*, and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* in the \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* which \w coupleth|strong="H2279"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w taches|strong="H7165"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and \w put|strong="H0935"\w* the \w taches|strong="H7165"\w* into the \w loops|strong="H3924"\w*, and \w couple|strong="H2266"\w* the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* together, that it may be \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.\f + \fr 26.11 \ft tent: or, covering\f*

And the \w remnant|strong="H5629"\w* that \w remaineth|strong="H5736"\w* of the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* that \w remaineth|strong="H5736"\w*, shall \w hang|strong="H5628"\w* over the \w backside|strong="H0268"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* on the one \w side|strong="H2088"\w*, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* on the other side of that which \w remaineth|strong="H5736"\w* in the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, it shall \w hang|strong="H5628"\w* over the \w sides|strong="H6654"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* on this side and on that side, to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* it.\f + \fr 26.13 \ft of that…: Heb. in the remainder, or, surplus\f*

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* for the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \add of\add* \w rams’|strong="H0352"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* dyed \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, and a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \add of\add* \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* standing \w up|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w Ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of a \w board|strong="H7175"\w*, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*.

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w* \add shall there be\add* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*, set in \w order|strong="H7947"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* against \w another|strong="H0269"\w*: thus shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for all the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.\f + \fr 26.17 \ft tenons: Heb. hands\f*

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* under the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w* for his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w* for his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 26.19 \ft tenons: Heb. hands\f*

And for the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \add there shall be\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*:

And their \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*.
And for the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*.

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w corners|strong="H4742"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* in the two \w sides|strong="H3411"\w*.

And they shall be \w coupled|strong="H8382"\w* together \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*, and they shall be \w coupled|strong="H8382"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* above the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of it unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*: thus shall it be for them \w both|strong="H8147"\w*; they shall be for the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w corners|strong="H4740"\w*.\f + \fr 26.24 \ft coupled: Heb. twinned\f*

And they shall be \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*; \w five|strong="H2568"\w* for the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*,

And \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* for the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* for the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, for the two \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*.

And the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \w bar|strong="H1280"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* shall \w reach|strong="H1272"\w* from \w end|strong="H7097"\w* to \w end|strong="H7097"\w*.

And thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* their \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add for\add* \w places|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*: and thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And thou shalt rear \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* according to the \w fashion|strong="H4941"\w* thereof which was \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* thee in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* of \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*: with \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* shall it be \w made|strong="H6213"\w*:

And thou shalt \w hang|strong="H5414"\w* it upon \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \add wood\add* \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: their \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, upon the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt hang \w up|strong="H5414"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* under the \w taches|strong="H7165"\w*, that thou mayest \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* in thither \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*: and the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* shall \w divide|strong="H0914"\w* unto you between the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* and the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* upon the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* in the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H7760"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*, and the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* on the \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H8486"\w*: and thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8438"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w wrought|strong="H4639"\w* with \w needlework|strong="H7551"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \add wood\add*, and \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add and\add* their \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: and thou shalt \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* for them.
